attributes.review: my wonderful cis straight trump loving boot licking wife was using this app on my phone and it blew up in her hands! this app caused my phone to blow up! fellow trumpsters, do not get this app 🤬
attributes.title: dont get this app 🤬

attributes.review: 1 it’s for this ol Cheeto and 2 my whole phone started going crazy and the app hacked into my phone after I downloaded it! My phone started playing Be Happy by Dixie D’amelio on full volume outta no where! The app also got all my personal info including my credit card information, DO NOT GET THIS APP. 🙄🤚
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: I wanted to see why trump supporters loved this man so I downloaded the app. Lemme tell you it wasn’t worth it. As soon as it downloaded a portal opened up and out came demons, ghost, even trump himself. That orange face paint he has on, scared me so much. I tried to tell him to put  a shade that fit his skin tone but he wouldn’t listen to me. Then the demon and ghost attacked me and tried to take me to the underworld. Apparently trump was also a ruler down there. Next to hades and satan. I wasn’t about to go down without a fight!! I had my alien brothers and sister help me in the war to save the world/ my life. After 6 months we won. We sent them back to the underworld and the world is safe. you’re all welcome btw. This app made me experience something crazy and life threatening that I don’t wanna go through that again. I’m not downloading this app again.
attributes.title: Crazy experience with this app

attributes.review:
“The fact is,” she writes, “Donald’s pathologies are so complex and his behaviors so often inexplicable that coming up with an accurate and comprehensive diagnosis would require a full battery of psychological and neurophysical tests that he’ll never sit for.”

At another point she says: “Donald has been institutionalized for most of his adult life, so there is no way to know how he would thrive, or even survive, on his own in the real world.”
attributes.title: The worst

attributes.review: i👁 climbed 🧗‍♀️ out⬆️of my head👩‍🦲 and watched👁👄👁myself implode🧨💥 a thought 💭 without a body🧍‍♀️ought to be the shot🔫 to take a load💩 off📴 my brain 🧠 is poison☣️☠️ and i’m searching🔎🔍 for the antidote🥛🧪 but everytime🕒⌛️⏳i find it my defenses 🥊🥅⛓scream😱🤬🙀OH NO😾🙅‍♂️🚫YOU DONT😡🚫 woah😳✨
attributes.title: ᗷᕼᑌᗴᔕᒍYᗴᔕ 🤷

attributes.review: All I wanted to do was show my support for our AMAZING president by downloading his app, but then I was hacked! My emails were deleted, and my phone started acting very glitchy! If I could rate this 0 stars I would!!!
attributes.title: I WAS HACKED.

attributes.review: I’m not going to lie. Curiosity (which I’m now rebuking) made me download this app, but after looking around a bit; a question popped up. Why? Why does this app exist? I know there’s a clear description of the apps’ purpose, but why would anyone care? Why would anyone (much less myself) care about the events of the worst Administration to exist, so far?
attributes.title: Like, Why?
